item.title: The Big Word Project
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
Brian over at Fairly Useless directed me over to The Big Word Project. The concept is simple, you purchase a word to redefine it. The redefinition is in the form of a link, so naturally

we bought "publisher" and linked it to us.
item.excerpt:encoded: Brian over at Fairly Useless directed me over to The Big Word Project. The concept is simple, you purchase a word to redefine it. The redefinition is in the form of a link, so naturally we bought "publisher" and linked it to us.
